title: My own club not showing up
body:
Soo I made a club a year or few months ago and It's not showing up for me at all. Soo I thought it somehow got disbanded or I got kicked out but my friend says the club's fine and I'm still the leader so they can't kick me out and invite me back in.

Clubs name: VHKs
Clubs tag: VHKs

Help? Or is there other way to make it show up that I don't know of?

replies.body: Your club may have been out of sync with your account, so I attempted a refresh.  You may need to relog first, but everything should be okay now.  Let me know!
Thanks man, everything seems to be fine! Pretty quick to respond, how do they get out of sync anyway? :d
There was an issue a while back where club owners couldn't see their clubs, and it was mostly resolved.  Sometimes I do see one-off cases here like this.   Glad to hear all is well now!

Hey, not sure if i just comment here or if i should make my own thread but i have the same issue. I made a club in October 2016 and came back after a bit of inactivity and it shows me that i joined 0/3 Clubs but i can't see my club neither can i make a club with the same name (it still exists since a few friends are still in it but it shows that i'm still Leader).
What are the club names and tags?  I'll take a look to see what's up.

Found this while looking for info on the same problem, I can't see my club at all but a friend of mine says I'm still in the club and that I'm the owner so if i could get some help it would be greatly appreciated, the club name is "Darknova" and the tag is "DNova".
Booped!  You should be able to see your club now.  Let me know if not!

Same problem.

Club Name: Mad Nerds
Tag: VIRG

I have the same issue

Club Name: Timbt
Tag: Q('.'Q)
Yes i can, thanks for the help!

Hi! I'm having the same issue... I can't see my club but all my friends still see me as owner

club: Eklaizia
tag: eklz

I'm getting the same issue here. 

Club name: Co-op players
Club tag: Co-op!

I have the same issue,too!

Club Name: Originals_LoL®
Tag: OrgL®
I cant see my own club :o

Hello, 
same problem for me:
Club: Chaotic Geniuses
Tag: Chage
Thanks for any help!
Same problem for me. Club :Flatliners  tag: RutR0
Having the same issue with clubs and i'm the owner. Its name is This is the cool kids and the tag is AHA;)

Having the same issue club is not showing up yet i'm still the owner, club name: Project Calamity,  Tag: [P/C]
Thanks!
